dialog.eventText: You approach a silhouette. Should you continue onward?
As you come closer, you can hear the clinking of metal. This figure is armed. It rears its head and snarls at you, aware of your presence.
The goblin collapses to the ground in injury. You are victorious.
You collapse to the ground in injury. You are defeated.
You revived miraculously. Go forth and conquer.
